hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
dmgr=`ssh -tt test@example.com "/usr/bin/sudo /sbin/service dmgr status"` apptarget=`ssh -tt test@example.com "/usr/bin/sudo /sbin/service bpm-app AppTarget status"` support=`ssh -tt test@example.com "/usr/bin/sudo /sbin/service bpm-app Support status"` messaging=`ssh -tt test@example.com "/usr/bin/sudo /sbin/service bpm-app Messaging status"`
if [ $dmgr -neq 0 ] || [ $apptarget -neq 0 || [ $messaging -neq 0 ] then echo "Fucked" exit 1 fi exit 0
